Uses of Package
com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster

  • Packages that use com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster 
    Package Description
    com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster
    Client for Redis Cluster, see RedisClusterClient.
    com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster.api.async
    Redis Cluster API for asynchronous executed commands.
    com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster.api.sync
    Redis Cluster API for synchronous executed commands.
    com.lambdaworks.redis.support
    Supportive classes such as RedisClientCdiBean for CDI support, RedisClientFactoryBean for Spring.
  • Classes in com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster used by com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster 
    Class and Description
    ClusterClientOptions
    Client Options to control the behavior of RedisClusterClient.
    ClusterClientOptions.Builder
    Builder for ClusterClientOptions.
    ClusterTopologyRefreshOptions
    Options to control the Cluster topology refreshing of RedisClusterClient.
    ClusterTopologyRefreshOptions.Builder
    Builder for ClusterTopologyRefreshOptions.
    ClusterTopologyRefreshOptions.RefreshTrigger
    Available refresh triggers to signal early topology refreshing.
    RedisAdvancedClusterAsyncCommandsImpl
    An advanced asynchronous and thread-safe API for a Redis Cluster connection.
    RedisAdvancedClusterAsyncConnection
    Deprecated. 
    Use RedisAdvancedClusterAsyncCommands
    RedisAdvancedClusterReactiveCommandsImpl
    An advanced reactive and thread-safe API to a Redis Cluster connection.
    RedisClusterClient
    A scalable thread-safe Redis cluster client.
    StatefulRedisClusterConnectionImpl
    A thread-safe connection to a Redis Cluster.
  • Classes in com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster used by com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster.api.async 
    Class and Description
    RedisAdvancedClusterAsyncConnection
    Deprecated. 
    Use RedisAdvancedClusterAsyncCommands
  • Classes in com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster used by com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster.api.sync 
    Class and Description
    RedisAdvancedClusterConnection
    Deprecated. 
    Use RedisAdvancedClusterCommands
  • Classes in com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster used by com.lambdaworks.redis.support 
    Class and Description
    RedisClusterClient
    A scalable thread-safe Redis cluster client.
